fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.manager

Class DeviceDependencies

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.manager.DeviceDependencies
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeviceRequest

    public class DeviceDependencies
extends Object
    Allows to define a device dependency in a declarative way. Dependencies are interpreted using registration order.
    Author:
    Thomas Leveque

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DeviceDependencies cloneDeps() 
      protected void cloneDepsInternal(DeviceDependencies clonedDeps) 
      DeviceDependencies createsOnDemand()
      Defines that proxies of matching devices will be created only when the application will access to them.
      DeviceDependency excludes()
      Specifies devices to exclude from this dependency specification.
      DeviceDependencies exportsTo(Class... proxyInterfaces)
      Defines that all matching devices will be exported as proxies which implements specified interfaces.
      List<DeviceDependency> getDependencies()
      Returns all device dependencies.
      List<Class> getExportedInterfaces()
      Returns list of interfaces implemented by created proxies.
      DeviceDependency includes()
      Specifies devices to include to this dependency specification.
      boolean isAll()
      Returns true if all devices are required.
      boolean isCreatedOnDemand()
      Returns true if device proxies are only created on demand.
      boolean isOptional()
      Returns true if this dependency is optional.
      boolean isRequiresAll()
      Returns true if we require to get all devices matching it.
      boolean isRequiresExclusiveAccess()
      Returns true if exclusive access will be given for corresponding devices.
      boolean isRequiresOne()
      Returns true if this request ask to return at most one device matching it.
      boolean isRequireUnavailableDevices()
      Returns true if we requires also known and unavailable devices.
      DeviceDependencies mandatory()
      Defines that this dependency is mandatory.

      Returns true if specified device matches this device dependencies.
      DeviceDependencies optional()
      Defines that this dependency is optional.
      DeviceDependencies requiresAll()
      This request ask to return all devices matching it.
      DeviceDependencies requiresExclusiveAccess()
      Specifies that application will get exclusive access to all devices which match this dependency.
      DeviceDependencies requiresOne()
      This request ask to return at most one device matching it.
      DeviceDependencies requiresUnavailableDevices()
      Defines that we requires also known and unavailable devices.
      String toString()
      Returns serialized form of the device dependency specification.

      • getExportedInterfaces

        public final List<Class> getExportedInterfaces()
        Returns list of interfaces implemented by created proxies. Returns an empty list if there is no exported interface.
        Returns:
        list of interfaces implemented by created proxies.

      • requiresExclusiveAccess

        public DeviceDependencies requiresExclusiveAccess()
        Specifies that application will get exclusive access to all devices which match this dependency.

      • createsOnDemand

        public DeviceDependencies createsOnDemand()
        Defines that proxies of matching devices will be created only when the application will access to them.
        Returns:

      • isRequiresExclusiveAccess

        public boolean isRequiresExclusiveAccess()
        Returns true if exclusive access will be given for corresponding devices.
        Returns:
        true if exclusive access will be given for corresponding devices.

      • isCreatedOnDemand

        public boolean isCreatedOnDemand()
        Returns true if device proxies are only created on demand. If set to false, first attempt to get the corresponding proxy may fail due to technical details of OSGi platform.
        Returns:
        true if device proxies are only created on demand.

      • isAll

        public final boolean isAll()
        Returns true if all devices are required.
        Returns:
        true if all devices are required.

      • exportsTo

        public DeviceDependencies exportsTo(Class... proxyInterfaces)
        Defines that all matching devices will be exported as proxies which implements specified interfaces. There could be a different generated proxy for each specfied interface.
        Parameters:
        proxyInterfaces - implemented interfaces by created proxies
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is no component able to export to specified interface.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns serialized form of the device dependency specification.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        serialized form of the device dependency specification.

        public boolean matches(Device dev)
        Returns true if specified device matches this device dependencies.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if specified device matches this device dependencies.
